body:
I'm not sure if many of you are aware or not, but blizzard entertainment are launching a new game this month called Overwatch.

I've been playing it for the last day or so and hoooolllllllyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy balls is it good. 

Heres the cinematic trailer - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FqnKB22pOC0 - and the gameplay trailer  - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dushZybUYnM 

I'm really thinking this is going to be the next 'BIG' fps game and if you're interesting. There's an open beta that starts in about 5-6 hours.
